objects.text:
3-in-1 Filter Technology
Removes Allergens & Pollutants
Ultra-Quiet Operation
Compact & Portable Design

product_details.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch. 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗩𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗨𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: Our Pre-Filter and Main Filter capture lint, hair, pet dander, fine airborne pollutants, and smoke particles, helping achieve a cleaner environment for you 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦: The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, odors, and fumes. You’ll love the feeling of breathing deeply at home 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: With the Levoit Core Mini-P air purifiers for home, focus on your activities in the bedroom, kitchen, or office. It offers an auto-off display for uninterrupted sleep and calming aromatherapy #𝟭 𝗔𝗜𝗥 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗥 𝗕𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗗: Levoit has sold over 6.5 million products worldwide, is available in 35 countries and regions, and has been a pioneer in air purification technology for 6 years 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗜𝗧 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗦: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier 𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: Our products are manufactured in both Vietnam and China, so you may receive a machine made in either Vietnam or China Color - White ** Brand - LEVOIT ** Product Dimensions - 6.5"D x 6.5"W x 10.4"H ** Floor Area - 337 Square Feet ** Specification Met - ETL Certified **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sleek promotional design for a compact air purifier product. It features a gradient background with soft blue hues and abstract wave patterns, establishing a clean and fresh aesthetic. The heading ("heading") is bold and futuristic in light blue, suggesting purity and modernity. Just below it, the subheading ("subheading") emphasizes the product type in a darker blue. A concise product description block ("description") is aligned left, describing features in small stacked bullet-point text. The pricing ("price") stands out in bold blue, with a call-to-action button ("cta" on "cta_background") just below it, drawing attention with its contrast. A high-quality purifier image ("product_image") is placed prominently on the right, enhancing visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: #78C7FF
- Deep Blue: #0D47A1
- White: #FFFFFF
- Rich Navy: #2C3E50
- Medium Blue: #1E88E5
- Soft Gradient Background: #EBF7FF to #D6EBFF
product_color: The product image features a modern and minimalistic color palette that enhances its sleek design. Dominated by a clean white (#FFFFFF) body, the product conveys purity and freshness, ideal for an air purifier. The top portion incorporates a deep charcoal gray (#3A3A3A), adding contrast and a high-tech vibe. Accents of soft light gray (#D9D9D9) and tiny highlights of blue (#00BFFF) and red (#FF4040) on the control panel emphasize its functionality and intuitive interface. The colors smoothly blend without harsh transitions, creating a polished look. Use this cool-toned palette in banners to highlight the product’s cleanliness, efficiency, and elegance.
